name: Glaceon LV.X
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_body.name: Chilly Breath
poke_body.effect: As long as Glaceon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent’s Pokémon can’t use any Poké-Powers.

attacks.name: Avalanche
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Glaceon. Glaceon LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
